summary: A comprehensive test suite for the Prefect task server that validates its serving mechanism, execution of both asynchronous and synchronous tasks, handling of custom task run names, result propagation, retry policies, state hooks, and tag propagation, while also confirming proper behavior when task scheduling is disabled.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the task server component by exercising all major execution paths, configuration options, and error handling scenarios, thereby supporting robust task orchestration in production deployments.
